thread.title: Old time Fiddlers to host fall festival, Oct. 18
thread.title_full: Old time Fiddlers to host fall festival, Oct. 18

title: Old time Fiddlers to host fall festival, Oct. 18
text: Old time Fiddlers to host fall festival, Oct. 18 Comment Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 12:01 AM Posted Oct. 11, 2015 at 12:01 AM BEACH LAKE - The Old Time Fiddlers will again host their annual fiddle festival on Sunday afternoon, October 18. The event will be held at the Beach Lake Fire Hall, 1033 Beach Lake Hwy, Rt. 652, Beach Lake. Doors will open at 1 p.m., with music starting at 2 p.m. Fiddlers will have a 15 minute showcase to perform their favorite tunes and songs. This is described as live traditional music at its best, featuring fiddlers and other musicians from the tri-state area. Some of the styles represented are bluegrass, Old-time, Celtic, western swing and Canadian. Requests are encouraged from the audience. Refreshments will be available throughout the day. The fire hall is handicap accessible. The Old Time Fiddlers (a non-profit organization) are celebrating our 36th year of performing and promoting traditional music in the area. “ This music is part of our heritage in this area so we encourage everyone to come out and support it. It’s our last event for 2015 and we hope to see many friends gathered for the day,” said Steve Jacobi of the Old Time Fiddlers. Admission prices are as follows: Adults - $10.00; seniors 65 & over - $8.00; students over 12 - $5.00; children 12 & under – free. For more information call 570-224-6330 or email fiddlinaround@verizon.net. Their website address istheoldtimefiddlers.com . News Eagle - Hawley, PA
